messages.subject: TRANSFER OF FUND,REPLY IMMIDIATELY
messages.body:
ATTN:SIR,

GOOD DAY, I DECIDED TO CONTACTS YOU IN RESPECT OF THE TRANSACTION
WHICH I WOULD LIKE YOU TO ASSIST ME AT THIS MOMENT.
I AM AOSHIMA MASAMI FROM JAPAN AND I HAVE DECIDED IN CONTACTING YOU
WITH DUE RESPECT.

ATTACHED IS A COPY OF MY INTERNATIONAL PASSPORT FOR YOUR REFFERENCE SO 
THAT YOU WILL KNOW AND BE SURE OF WHOM YOU ARE DELAING WITH.

DUE TO THE HOSTAGE TAKING IN THE NIGER DELTA REGION WHERE I WORK I HAVE
DECIDED TO LEAVE NIGERIA AND MY FUND THE SUM OF $2.7M AM SEEKING FOR
HELP AND SUPPORT ON HOW TO TRANSFER OUT MY FUND BEFORE I LEAVE NIGERIA.

I AM WORKING PRESENTLY IN NIGERIA WITH TEXACO OIL IN PORT HARCOURT AS AN

OIL ENGINEER IN THE OIL INDUSTRY

PLEASE SEND ME YOUR ACCOUNT DETAILS AND A COPY OF YOUR INTERNATIONAL
PASSPORT FOR MY REFFERRENCE.
YOU CAN REACH ME ON MY DIRECT MOBILE NUMBER +234-8066246754

THANK YOU.
AOSHIMA MASAMI

messages.body:
Kon Ni chi Wa Dr Masami ! 

"a ri ga to u" for your offer and trust in me! I'll do my best to help 
you. 

Attached is one of my passports. Do you prefer a bank account on the 
seychelles or in singapore? I have no European account, as I am not 
allowed to enter the EU anymore. Please don't mention about our contact to

anyone because my life could be at risk. 

Waiting for your reply
messages.raw:
Christo Suleimanov

My answer:

Kon Ni chi Wa Dr Masami !

"a ri ga to u" for your offer and trust in me! I'll do my best to help you.

Attached is one of my passports. Do you prefer a bank account on the seychelles or in singapore? I have no European account, as I am not allowed to enter the EU anymore. Please don't mention about our contact to anyone because my life could be at risk.

Waiting for your reply

The pic I attached was taken from google images and was actually only the cover of a Honduras passport.

messages.body:
Christo Suleimanov, 

Thanka for your mail.Please re attach and send your passport copy to me
because I cannot see your picture in the attached passport. 

The transaction is 100% risk free and nobody will ever know the deal go
ahead and send any of your good account either in Singapore or Sychelles
where the fund will be wired transfered. 

As soon as I receive your bank account we shall proceed immidiately with
the transfer. 

YOU CAN REACH ME ON MY DIRECT MOBILE NUMBER +234-8066246754 

Thank you. 

Aoshima Masami

messages.body:
Kon Ni chi Wa Dr Masami !

I'm attaching a scan of my fake croatian passport that I would like to use
for that transaction. It's been used many times already and works
flawlessly. I can also send you a scan of my driver's license, if any
driving would be needed?

my bank account number is ABN-SEY-145366642 , swift code SEYCHABN

I'm opening a bottle of Kirin in your honor! cheers
the photo I attached this time was also from google and was a croatian
driver's license , photoshop-ed with a photo of a muslim woman where you
can only see her eyes :)
